short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly picks a commenter from a youtube page. All have equally great possibility to be picked up regardless number comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Randomly picks a commenter from a Youtube page. All the commenters have equally great possibility to be picked up regardless how many comments they have made.

Limitations:
- Only comments that are visible on the page (scrolled down) are taken into account.
- Those commenters that have only responded to other comments are ignored.
- You have to make a page refresh to make to button visible. It does not become visible, when moving around inside Youtube.
